Conferences and Talks

  • 10 March 2010: WoMoz Project presentation at Epitech University in Paris, during their week on Diversity Theme
  • 5-7 Feb 2010: WoMoz Workgroup sessions are programmed. There will be a lightning talk by Alix Cazenave and Delphine, as well as a WoMoz booth during the event.
    More info: FOSDEM 2010.
  • 27-28 Nov 2009: JM2L in Sophia Antipolis (France), Delphine will be presenting the WoMoz project (possibility of dedicated booth).
  • 16-17 Oct 2009: JDLL in Lyon (France), Julia and Delphine will man a dedicated booth to present the WoMoz project.
  • 19 Sept 2009: Podcamp Barcelona (Spain), Delphine will be presenting Mozilla communities, as well as the WoMoz project.

WoMoz Meet-up Sessions

Want to organize in your own country a brainstorming session with members of your community, in order to exchange ideas to promote women's position in open source? You can propose a session here. People interested in attending can add their names next to the proposed session.

  • 6-7 Feb 2010: FOSDEM, FOSDEM 2010 and FOSDEM 2010 Agenda & Notes
  • 2 Oct 2009: WoMoz Brainstorming Dinner, MozCamp Pragues

WoMoz Meetings

  • Every second Thursday of every month: 09:00a Pacific, 17:00 UTC
    • Agenda + Notes (on the Mozilla Wiki)
    • IRC: #womoz on moznet

For the moment, meetings are held on IRC. Later, calls will be at:

  • US/International: +1 650 903 0800 x92 Conf# 8600
  • Canada: +1 416 848 3114 x92 Conf# 8600
  • US toll-free: +1 800 707 2533 (pin 369) Conf# 8600

Please see our Agenda and Notes on the Mozilla Wiki for more details. Future meetings and topics are listed there, as well as the meeting notes from these sessions.
